entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.9.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.9.2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.9.1...v5.9.2

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.9.3
entry.content:
Note: If you are having permissions issues, this update should fix that

What's Changed

  • Revert using preconfigured node user by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/274

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.9.2...v5.9.3

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.9.4

What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.9.3...v5.9.4

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Docker entrypoint by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/277
  • Update translation.json by @HanaO00 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/279
  • Api code deduplication by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/278
  • Add info endpoint by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/281
  • Add basic helm chart for deployments to k8s by @Tra5is in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/265

New Contributors

  • @Tra5is made their first contribution in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.9.4...v5.10.0
